**[ORDER NOW THIS SERVER](https://cli.ginernet.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=308&language=English "Order")**

**IPv4 Genuine:** All servers are delivered with an IPv4 address which we call genuine. This IP is associated with the server and cannot be changed or moved to another server. If you cancel or don't renew the server, the IP is lost.


**IPv4 Fail Over:** We offer Fail Over or floating IP addresses, which you can move from one server to another. These IPs you will still have them as you renew them. They have a cost of 2 €/month, [you can order them here](https://cli.ginernet.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=235&language=English "you can order them here")


**IPv4 AntiDDoS:** If you are under attack, you must acquire an IP that is permanently routed by Voxility. These IPs execute mitigation in real time, are also fail-over and cost 3 €/month, [you can order them here](https://cli.ginernet.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=259&language=English "you can order them here")

**IPv6:** All customers can obtain a /48 subnet at no cost (must apply by ticket). That subnet can be split into smaller /64 subnets that are routed to the servers and are fail-over. You can also purchase additional /48 subnets for 12 €/year.


I remain at your disposal to answer your questions in this thread or you can contact the support service to clear any questions you have.

Best regards!!
